item.title: Told Sold or Trolled?
item.description: Thoughts on Semi-Automated Threat Detection or Hunting These are merely musings, and by no means an exhaustive list, nor is it intended to be of the quality of a professional publication; lacking references and use of pronouns. However, I wish to bring to light some issues. Sold, told and trolled are three things we should realize. We may have discouraged the use of important tools due to dogma, or marketing hype.
